short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Seamlessly compile text from web sources.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever spent time switching tabs between your online source and your note taking document to copy and paste important quotes and information about the source? That's where Scribe comes in! 

1) Click on the Scribe icon in the top right corner of your browser and enter in the name of the Google Doc where you are taking your notes, or enter in a name for a new Google Doc. 
2) Highlight and right click on the text you want to copy from this webpage.
3) Click "Add text to (insert name of your Google Doc Here)" 
4) Your highlighted text will appear in your Google Doc along with the URL of the webpage it came from!

We hope that Scribe will help cut down time spent switching between browser windows or word documents and help streamline your note-taking!

Thanks for downloading Scribe, and let us know how you like it in the comments/review section!

- Team Scribe
